programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Jordan: Nature's Furnace
programme.desc: The natural world of the Middle East is governed by one natural force - the Sun. It claims its victims and breathes new life. The wildlife in Jordan faces some of the natural worlds greatest chalenges.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice
programme.desc: Covering a fifth of the earth's surface, the Arctic tundra is one of the coldest places on the planet. The piercing temperatures and powerful winds challenge even the hardiest of creatures.

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Arabia: Land of Illusions
programme.desc: The Arabian peninsula is an ancient land of illusion. Extreme heat seems to sap life out of every corner. Yet, tricks of the light and the art of deception make survival possible. Nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Amazon: One Jungle, Many Worlds
programme.desc: The Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world, and the richest ecosystem on earth. This film uncovers what makes the Amazon such a powerhouse of evolution; how it has come to home a third of all species on the planet.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: While their sisters chose a life of sensible, suburban motherhood, these deadly women chose a life of crime. They lived with the thrills, the danger and the deadly consequences of being outlaws.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: We want to believe that all women would give their lives to protect their children. But there are horrifying cases when a mother will turn against her natural instinct and kill her own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Deadly Possessions
programme.desc: A grandmother caring for her grandchildren, a young girl in love with a boy, and a mother protecting her son are consumed with intense love. But when that love is threatened, they find it too much to bear and take measures into their own hands.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Sacrifice Their Blood
programme.desc: To the outside world these caring mothers present a face of love - a suburban Mom, a caring community member, a housewife - but when the doors close, these deadly women will do whatever it takes to have their own needs met, even destroy their family.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Lethal Love
programme.desc: Love is a powerful emotion, one that sits in the core of our soul and fills our lives with hope. But when love turns sour, the results can be deadly. In an act of revenge, these deadly women unite with one common goal, to kill.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The World Trade Center Bombing
programme.desc: Terrorist bombings are what happen in other countries. Not here in the United States. And yet, in 1993, it happened in New York City.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Human Prey
programme.desc: Thomas Dillon killed five outdoorsmen at random over a period of three years in rural southern Ohio. After a tip led the FBI to the murder weapon, ballistic testing made a match.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The C-11 Squad
programme.desc: New York City is not stranger to gang violence. But when a 12-year-old child was kidnapped, the gangs had crossed a line. Law enforcement raced to find the missing boy before it was too late.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A daring kidnapping and a bizarre ransom note baffled Mississippi authorities. The victim was the wife of a wealthy businessman. A list of 12 names and a few drops of blood were the only clues to her fate.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Business

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge Down Under

programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: A Dry Spell
programme.desc: Meg is faced with a difficult decision: to stay at the place she loves or to leave with the man she loves.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Three's A Crowd
programme.desc: Harry yearns to know all about Peter Johnson who seems to be settling in at Drovers Run. His background check turns up a surprise, but unable to inform Claire himself, he tells Becky who must decide what to do with the information.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Bridle Waltz
programme.desc: Harry guilt-trips Becky into telling Claire that Peter is married. Liz tries to reconcile Harry and the boys. Tess decides to leave Drovers Run and work in the caf with Simon and Briny.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: To Have And To Hold
programme.desc: Claire's relationships are fragmented - she and Becky are barely speaking, and Tess is now living in Melbourne, unaware of recent events.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Home is Where the Heart is
programme.desc: Claire is taking the loss of both Peter and Tess badly. Unable to raise energy or enthusiasm for anything, including the imminent birth of Blaze's foal, she nonetheless refuses to accept she is suffering from emotional stress.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wildfire
programme.desc: Becky's brother Mark reappears, determined to drag Sean away from his wholesome life at Killarney. Mark knocks Nick out and coerces Sean into helping steal the Ryans' prize stallion, Wildfire.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nations number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the worlds largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canadas largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 7
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Sofia Central Prison, Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: With a crumbling foundation fit for demolition, Sofia Central prison is inhospitable for anyone, including criminals. With multiple prisoner cells, bunks stacked 3 high and horrid isolation cells, prisoners live idly behind bars for 23 hours a day.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Miami, Dade County Jail Boot Camp, Miami, Florida, USA
programme.desc: The toughest divisions of the Miami Dade: Boot Camp gives minor offenders a chance to escape the prison through unforgiving drills and rules. To many it is a better alternative to The M-D County Jail where murderers and rapists have their own rules.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Colony 100 Ukraines prison for hardened criminals is marked by an omnipresent hopelessness.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: South Cotabato Jail is one of the most overcrowded prisons in the world. There is no hope of improvement.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: The inmates in the Carcel Distrital in Colombia fight many battles: against other prisoners, against the guards and most of all against themselves. It's a battle that most of them lose.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasnt so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesnt come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicias text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her hot girl summer. Not only that, but he doesnt trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isnt ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesnt get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhans bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and shes not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Operation Repo: Natural Liar
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. But with Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put their hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put the discussion on hold while they repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high-speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Un-Treatable
programme.desc: Maya buys a dress that is too expensive knowing it might cause problems with her husband, Darnell. Joan treats herself to a trip to New York to visit her boyfriend, realizing the distance between the two of them is a problem.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Buh-Bye
programme.desc: Joan ends the friendship between her and Toni after finding out that Toni has been discussing her personal life with co-workers behind her back. Meanwhile, Lynn is trying to cope with her new living situation with Vosco, and his lack of a job.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Willie or Wont He
programme.desc: Yvonne is concerned that William is never going to marry her because they have not set a date for the wedding. When Yvonne asks Joan for advice, Joan tries her best to stay out of it but ends up telling Yvonne to move in with William first to try it out.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: From The Balcony
programme.desc: The dating game has Danni at a disadvantage when her feelings get the best of her. Andi tries to be strong for Gary. Karen stands strong on her principles. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Yellow Dress
programme.desc: Gary and Jasmine confront each other and the gloves come off. Andi struggles to maintain her career. Karen is confronted by a new enemy. Sabrina grows frustrated. (S1, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Home For A Queen
programme.desc: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice. Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Bad Feeling
programme.desc: The ladies are worried about Andi and her relationship. Karen tries to figure out what she wants. Sabrina tends to Calvin in his time of need. Danni tries to move on from her hurt feelings. (S1, ep24)

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt1
programme.desc: Karlinvestigates the very haunted school room in the large imposing Gressenhall Workhouse. The activity starts even beforeKarlgets into the building and becomes one of the most impressive investigations to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P1
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house and seems to be pulled in different directions from an unexplained energy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karlventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small theatre with a big problemghosts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all but forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven Nose, Mister Smith
programme.desc: Jonathan must stop an angel who's back on Earth with the intention of breaking up his son's marriage.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: A chauvinistic coach doesn't want a female wide receiver on his junior-high football team.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Whose Trash Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Mark's friend is running for public office, and he's a very honest man. But things get out of hand when an opponent tries to win by going after his son.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Hello and Farewell - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan helps Commander Michaels to deal with flashbacks of Vietnam; he also tries to convince her to go to therapy. Mark deals with his fear of flying.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Silent Bell
programme.desc: A pastor must follow a church council's decision to fire most of the staff at the school because they're not Christian.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Du Plessis is restless after his heart surgery but the family insist he needs to relax. Meanwhile Danny and Alice are happy to have closed down a zoo down that has been mistreating animals.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.desc: Barney takes the kids to Hawaii on a quest for a bird of paradise. While there, they meet some friends, learn new Hawaiian words, make a Hawaiian lei and dance a hula! Eventually, Barney and his friends find a bird of paradise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Three kids try to build a pretend farm with disastrous results because they won't work together. Barney and his friends try to cheer up Olivia.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Once a Pawn a Time

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Amber jets off on holiday, it's even more bad news for Sassi as she loses her job. Shannon hits a wall and Megan feels lonelier than ever. Chloe forces Jordan to be romantic. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Emotions run high for Megan as Dylan goes AWOL. Sassi gets some big news. Amber throws an engagement party to remember. And it's super-sad times for Chloe as Jordan gets a diagnosis. (S5, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Shannon has some exciting news but Charlie isn't happy. Sassi sits Darren down and demands answers. Amber and Ste are at breaking point and Megan tries to talk some sense into Dylan. (S5, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Charlie struggles to accept Shannon's pregnancy, while Megan can't step away from Dylan. Ste stays over at Amber's and Chloe and Jordan make a tearful breakthrough. (S5, ep7)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Heroes Under Fire
programme.desc: A fire that ignited in an abandoned warehouse in Worcester, Massachusetts in 1999, claimed the lives of six firefighters. A homeless couple living in the building, were subsequently charged with manslaughter for starting the blaze.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Blue River Murder
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2010 death of Stephanie Roller, a Colorado mother of three who allegedly went for a walk during a blizzard and was later found dead in a nearby river.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Citizen Jane
programme.desc: When Gertrude McCabe was murdered, her niece Jane Alexander was named her principal beneficiary. Jane, a widow in her 70s, began to suspect that her live-in boyfriend, Tom O'Donnell, might have been involved in the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: My Father's Killer
programme.desc: James Bernard Campbell entered SueZann Bosler's home, murdered her father and almost killed her. 48 HOURS follows SueZann as she returns to the crime scene and then focuses on her unusual crusade for justice.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Taken: The Amber Dubois Story
programme.desc: A report on the February 2009 disappearance of Amber Dubois, just blocks from Escondido High School in California. 48 HOURS examines the permanent impact her disappearance has had on her family, even after the discovery and conviction of the murderer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: AKA Rockefeller
programme.desc: Authorities suspect a con man who has used many different identities may be a murderer.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Long before Jurassic Park, dinosaurs roamed thru a variety of horror films, going all the way back to The Lost World in 1925.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror: Mummies
programme.desc: Karloffs parchment-skin role set the standard for mummy movies, but many others have gotten wrapped up in their work over the years, as youll see.

programme.title: Wes Craven's Mind Ripper
programme.desc: A top secret experiment intended to produce a superhuman has gone terribly wrong. Now the creators, trapped in a remote desert outpost, are being pursued ruthlessly by their creation.

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed. Starring: Peter Horton, Linda Hamilton, R.G. Armstrong, John Franklin, Courtney Gains

programme.title: Pluto TV 80s Horror
programme.desc: Slashers, synths, and supernatural scaresPluto TV 80s Horror brings you the blood-soaked glory days of fright. From cult classics to VHS gems, relive the decade that made horror iconic. Big hair, bigger screams!

programme.desc: Slashers, synths, and supernatural scaresPluto TV 80s Horror brings you the blood-soaked glory days of fright. From cult classics to VHS gems, relive the decade that made horror iconic. Big hair, bigger screams!

programme.desc: Slashers, synths, and supernatural scaresPluto TV 80s Horror brings you the blood-soaked glory days of fright. From cult classics to VHS gems, relive the decade that made horror iconic. Big hair, bigger screams!

programme.title: Rats: Night of Terror
programme.desc: Rats: Night of Terror is a post-apocalyptic pot-boiler sees some of the last humans alive grapple with a horde of flesh-eating rodents - and a shocking final revelation that has fast become director Bruno Mattei's signature 'twist'.

programme.title: Psycho Cop
programme.desc: Six college students on their weekend vacation are humiliated and killed one by one by a psycho cop.

programme.title: Pluto TV Slasher Movies
programme.desc: Pluto TV Slasher Movies carves into the heart of horror with relentless killers, suspenseful chases, and unforgettable screams. From cult classics to modern gore, its a nonstop spree of slashing terror. Only the brave survive

programme.title: Extracurricular: Extracurricular
programme.desc: An entertaining blast of mean-spirited genre thrills, starring Luke Goss (Bros fame). Four high school seniors make a pact to execute a series of perfect, elaborate murders and get some thrills behind them before going to college.

programme.title: Terror Train
programme.desc: Three years after a prank that went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train. Starring: Ben Johnson, Jamie Lee Curtis, Hart Bochner, David Copperfield

programme.title: The Revenge of Frankenstein
programme.desc: Baron Frankenstein escapes from the guillotine and goes to Germany. There, he names himself Dr. Stein and plans to restart his gruesome experiments. Starring: Peter Cushing, Francis Matthews, Eunice Gayson

programme.title: Odd Thomas
programme.desc: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces. Starring: Anton Yelchin, Ashley Sommers, Leonor Varela, Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Shark Attack 3 Megalodon
programme.desc: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon is a jaws-dropping action thriller from the director of Kickboxer starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane. When two researchers discover a colossal shark's tooth off the Mexican coast their worst fears surface.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E6 - Picture If You Will
programme.desc: Chiana buys a picture in a store, which is more than it seems. The picture changes and shows Chiana what will happen to her.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E7 - Home On The Remains
programme.desc: The crew needs food. Zhaan needs to eat meat and starts spewing spores. Only Aeryn seems to have a tolerance for the spores.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E8 - Dream A Little Dream
programme.desc: While waiting for Moya to pick their Transport Pod, Zhaan tells Crichton of Moya's adventures after the Gammak base was destroyed.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E9 - Out Of Their Minds
programme.desc: An alien ship fires a weapon at Moya. The blast makes it through and causes everyone's consciousness to jump into another body.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E10 - My Three Crichtons
programme.desc: A strange globe appears on Moya, sucking in Crichton and duplicating him creating two additional people.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E11 - Look At The Princess, Part 1: A Kiss Is But A Kiss
programme.desc: On a planet about to crown its new monarch. The problem is the Princess cannot ascend unless she finds a genetically compatible mate.
